newsitem.title: GERMANY: MUM shares to be listed at 45 dmk/shr.
newsitem.headline: MUM shares to be listed at 45 dmk/shr.

text.p: Shares in Germany's Mensch und Maschine Software AG (MUM) will be issued to subscribers to the company's initial public offering at a price of 45 marks, arranger DG Bank said on Friday.
This is at the upper end of the bookbuilding range of 38 marks to 45 marks.
DG Bank said the issue of 459,800 shares for the bourse's New Market for growth stocks was more than 150 times oversubscribed.
Due to the high demand, only every 130th order received had been allocated shares. The orders to be fulfilled were selected in a lottery, DG Bank said.
The shares will list on the New Market on Monday.
